snippet: Music from multiple composers is brought together in “The Armida Project,” a surreal Baroque pastiche.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews premiere of opera The Armida Project, which features music from several Baroque composers, conceived and directed by Igor Konyukhov and starring soprano Julia Lima at the Angel Orensanz Foundation.
lead_paragraph: Music from multiple composers is brought together in “The Armida Project,” a surreal Baroque pastiche.

headline.seo: ‘The Armida Project’ at the Angel Orensanz Foundation
headline.main: A Woman Abandoned in a Story Often Told
headline.print_headline: A Woman Abandoned In a Story Often Told
